items.sentence: I can\'t make that decision without consulting Tom first.
Tom is good at French, but he\'s a lot better at English.
Tom said he was willing to do whatever needed to be done.
Tom said that he and Mary will probably be a little late.
Tom can afford to eat at expensive restaurants every day.
Tom can no longer do the things he used to be able to do.
I studied French in school, but I\'m not very good at it.
It wasn\'t exactly what I wanted, but I bought it anyway.
They wouldn\'t serve Tom a drink because he was underage.
This afternoon\'s meeting has been postponed to tomorrow.
